net.jxta.impl.cm
Class CacheManager

java.lang.Object
  net.jxta.impl.cm.CacheManager

public final class CacheManager
extends Object

This class implements a limited document caching mechanism intended to provide cache for services that have a need for cache to search and exchange jxta documents.

Only Core Services are intended to use this mechanism.

As of 2009-06-03, Cm is now a wrapper around an implementation of the LegacyAdvertisementCache that is selected at runtime. The original Cm implementation is available as XIndiceAdvertisementCache.

To specify an alternative implementation to be used, you can currently set the system property specified by CACHE_IMPL_SYSPROP to the full class name of your implementation, which must implement AdvertisementCache.

getRecords

public List<InputStream> getRecords(String dn,
                                    int threshold,
                                    List<Long> expirations)
Gets the list of all the files into the given folder

Parameters:
dn - contains the name of the folder
threshold - the max number of results
expirations - List to contain expirations
Returns:
List Strings containing the name of the files
